attributes.action: Obligation for companies to have its callcentres inside the UK territory
attributes.background:
Companies (mainly telecoms) needs to start generating jobs in UK since they are taking money from UK people.
Also people prepared and with a good English to resolve customer's issues

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "an obligation", how this would be enforced or who it would apply to.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
